quest.name: Linu's Lovely Bones
journal:
New friends have brought fortunate news to Linu Vali's ears.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

Thanks to the village's new residents, Ok' Gundu Nakki's growth is proceeding apace, and relations between the Gundu and Zundu are improving. The deepening bonds have already borne fruit, and Linu Vali has received word that a Vanu Vanu wearing Gundu colors has been sighted in Vundu territory, attempting to save another of his tribe from abuse at the hands of Vundu youths by shouting “No more violence!” at them. Linu Vali remarks that she had an old friend that often used that phrase to avoid conflict, and surmises that it must be him. She has come up with a plan to rescue him from his oppressors, and asks for your aid. Meet Linu Vali in front of Vundu Ok' Bendu and help her reunite with her erstwhile companion.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

When you meet with Linu Vali, she explains her plan to draw Ginu Vanu to you with bones inscribed with a mark known only to the two friends. Once Ginu Vanu notices the mark, Linu Vali is sure that he will follow them to their source. Place the bones conspicuously around the area so the Vanu can find them.
You have placed the bones in such a way that even the most oblivious observer could find them. Return to Linu Vali and await Ginu Vanu's arrival.

All goes according to Linu Vali's plan, and Ginu Vanu finds the bones and follows their trail. Upon sighting you, Ginu Vanu puts on a show of aggression to playfully frighten his old friend, but his demeanor quickly becomes friendly. Ginu Vanu agrees to return with you to Ok' Gundu Nakki without argument, but before you can leave a group of Vundu scouts appears nearby. Instead of resorting to violence, Linu Vali decides to scare the Vundu away with her sundrop dance─but first she needs inspiration. /dance for the timid Vanu to awaken the spirit of the warrior within her.

Your dancing rekindles Linu Vali's courage, and she puts on an impressive and terrifying display for the Vundu scouts, sending them running in fear. With your escape route secure, return to Ok' Zundu to introduce Ok' Gundu Nakki's new ally to the Zundu chieftain.

The Zundu chieftain and his attendant are excited to meet yet another of the Gundu's artisans, and Sonu Vanu is eager to see what changes this will bring to the village. The Gundu return to their new home to welcome its new resident. Return with them and speak with Linu Vali when you arrive.

Ok' Gundu Nakki has one more voice among its villagers, and Linu Vali is excited to continue developing her mastery of the sundrop dance. However, she still mourns the absence of her brother, rightful chief of the Gundu tribe, and vows to rescue him from the Vundu. The winds of change are always blowing, and Linu Vali once again asks for you to answer their call when next they beckon.
objectives: Rendezvous with Linu Vali at Vundu Ok' Bendu.
Place the bleached bones throughout Vundu Ok' Bendu.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Forename, many from Ok' Zundu come to share in Ranu Vali and Eenu Vanu's wisdom. Like trees in grove, our roots become more intertwined each passing day.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Ranu shares the secrets of Gundu botany, and Eenu spends long hours exchanging advice with Zundu cloudfishers.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Linu swells with pride at success of village, but shame still nags at her like single midge buzzing in ear. If she cannot perform sundrop dance in heat of battle, then she is no more use to village than newborn hatchling...

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: But now is not the time for self-pity! Ranu Vali's friend from Ok' Zundu tells intriguing story around cooking fires.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: While delivering tribute to Vundu, Ranu's friend notices group mercilessly beating Vanu wearing Gundu colors. Another Gundu approaches the group, shouting, “No more violence!” But the Vundu mock his pleas, and chase him from the village.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Linu Vali has an old friend, Ginu Vanu, who says same thing ever since nestling days. Forename, we must help him before he faces punishment for his words.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Forename does not fear violent Vundu youths. Please, come to Vundu Ok' Bendu with Linu Vali. With Forename's help, we bring friend back safely to Ok' Gundu Nakki!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Linu sees no Vundu patrolling area, but we must act quickly─like storm during monsoon season, they are never far away. Here, take bones of sanuwa, Forename. Linu carves mark only her and Ginu Vanu recognize.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: When Ginu sees mark, he knows that Linu comes to rescue him. Place bones throughout Vundu Ok' Bendu in trail leading to hiding spot, and he follows!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Ginu Vanu spends many moons under brutal rule of Vundu, and he may fear consequences of being captured. But when Linu Vali tells him of Ok' Gundu Nakki, the promise of a new home gives him courage to come with us.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Forename, place bones around Vundu Ok' Bendu, and guide Ginu Vanu back to us. Linu Vali keeps watch for any Vundu patrols.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: The mark is secret only Linu Vali and Ginu Vanu know. Place bones, and he comes.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: The bones guide Ginu Vanu to us! And now, we wait!

dialogue.name: GINUVANU
dialogue.text: (-???-)Gundu rebels! Surrender, or else!

dialogue.name: GINUVANU
dialogue.text: Hahaha. As ever, Linu scares easily as nestling lost in dark. When Ginu sees marks on bones, he knows his friend is come!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Ginu, to meet again brings Linu great joy! He looks healthy as crops after nourishing spring rain.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Linu flees along with other Gundu, and this netherling rescues us from capture. Thanks to herhis help, tribe receives gift from Zundu: a new island to call home.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Ginu Vanu, return with us to Ok' Gundu Nakki, and share knowledge of Gundu carpentry to make our modest village grand! Do not fear, Forename guides us safely back.

dialogue.name: GINUVANU
dialogue.text: If Ginu says no, he is more foolish than Vanu who plants seeds during drought. No matter how modest village is, it is surely preferable to suffering longer under Vundu abuse!

dialogue.name: GINUVANU
dialogue.text: A Vundu patrol! Quickly, hide before they pluck our feathers and throw us in skycages!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Wait! Linu practices sundrop dance day and night, and now the time comes to prove herself. But the Vundu look fierce, and Linu cannot hope to strike fear into their hearts without inspiration... Forename, show Linu the dance of your tribe!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Rouse Linu's strength with your mighty dance, and she will send the Vundu fleeing! Quickly!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Rouse Linu's warrior spirit with your dance, Forename! There is not much time!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: No, no, netherling! Forename must dance!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Linu feels the warrior spirit within her─coursing through her entire body! Now, Forename, witness the awesome power of Linu Vali's dance!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Haha, they run like cowardly korrigans! Forename's dance reawakens Linu Vali's ferocity, and brings forth true might of her sundrop dance!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Come, let us return to Ok' Zundu and speak with Sonu Vanu, before patrol returns.

dialogue.name: GINUVANU
dialogue.text: No more violence! We must run or face wrath of Vundu scouts!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Chief Sonu, today Linu Vali brings before you Ginu Vanu, greatest builder of the Gundu tribe, and a dear friend.

dialogue.name: SANUVANU
dialogue.text: Ah, many Vanu tell stories of great Gundu architecture, and today a renowned builder stands before us! Sanu has much interest in hearing Ginu Vanu's wisdom!

dialogue.name: SANUVANU
dialogue.text: ...Ah, Sanu apologizes for his interruption. Forgive me, Chief Sonu.

dialogue.name: SONUVANU
dialogue.text: Hahaha, there is no need for apologies. Like the most precious of crystals, Gundu culture possesses many facets. All Zundu have much to look forward to as our tribes grow closer.

dialogue.name: SONUVANU
dialogue.text: Many Vanu admire the techniques of Gundu crafters. With time, Ok' Gundu Nakki may become a village to rival the greatest in Vanu history.

dialogue.name: SANUVANU
dialogue.text: The traditions and techniques of the Gundu crafters are of great interest to Sanu. He looks forward to discussing much with them in the future.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Ok' Gundu Nakki is alive with the sound of celebration! And Linu Vali finally dances. Like skies on clear summer day, she is free from worry.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Occasion calls for hearty feast! Linu Vali eats until stomach can hold no more, and then practices dance until sun itself smiles in approval.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Alas, Ok' Gundu Nakki still lacks a leader─a strong chief. Brother is yet trapped in skycage, hanging somewhere in vast cloud sea.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Although Brother's whereabouts remain a mystery, Linu Vali swears to find him one day. Forename, when that day comes, the Gundu may call on your aid once more.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Ginu Vanu has started construction on the Chief's Roost.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have achieved Friendly reputation with the Gundu.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: New Vanu Vanu tribal daily quests are now available from Muna Vanu at Ok' Gundu Nakki.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will receive an experience point bonus upon the completion of Vanu Vanu tribal daily quests.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, you will be able to undertake three additional quests from Muna Vanu as a reputation rank bonus. This bonus is available until the daily reset time for tribal quests.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: These additional quests will become available after accepting all current daily quests from Muna Vanu. Please be advised that you cannot undertake these quests if you have no remaining allowances.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, you now have access to a wider selection of wares from Luna Vanu.

obj.n: In the Skycage over the Sea
